sub_title: Global Digital Marketing Manager at AkzoNobel
summary:
Marketing professional with 12+ years of experience in developing and executing Digital Marketing strategies for B2B (Chemicals, Health, Nutrition and Materials) and B2C (Telecom, FMCG) companies. Experience working in top-5 advertising agencies: JWT ($15,6 billion) and McCann ($9,1 billion), as well as in multinationals AkzoNobel ($10 billion) and  DSM ($9,6 billion). 

Expertise in Digital Strategy, Tactics and Execution; Lead Generation and Conversions, Digital Media, Mobile & Web, Marketing Automation, E-commerce, Analytics, E-mail marketing;  Marketing Communications and Branding. 

MBA degree, TIAS Business School, The Netherlands, Top-100 MBA program worldwide; Bachelor in Engineering & Computer Science.

Companies & Clients: AkzoNobel, DSM, WPP, Interpublic, Bayer, Shell, Mondelez, Nestle, PepsiCo, Carlsberg, Unilever.

education.field_of_study: Digital Marketing: SEM, SEO, Social Media and Beyond

school.name: TIAS School for Business and Society

education.field_of_study: Full-time MBA, Tias Business School, Top-100 MBA program, Tilburg University, Netherlands

school.name: National Technical University of Ukraine 'Kyiv Polytechnic Institute'​

profile_positions.description:
DIGITAL STRATEGY 
• Design and implement Digital strategy supporting business strategy through digital marketing and sales 
• Set the vision for digital capabilities and build them in line with customer decision journey 
• Translate strategy to tactical plan and portfolio of Digital initiatives through internal teams, agency partners and other service providers 

DEMAND GENERATION, E-COMMERCE, SALES PROCESS SUPPORT 
• Deliver digital marketing programs including demand and lead generation, e-commerce, web, mobile, marketing automation and associated platforms 
• Build and evolve a portfolio of easily localized and integrated digital assets to work across brands, markets and audiences
• Define KPIs, targets, set budget & resource priority  
• Accountable for enabling commercial impact (incl. online sales) 
• Pro-actively monitor digital portfolio in order to fully optimize activities and respond to issues, in conjunction with IM ensure that ongoing support is in place for digital solutions
• Ensure that digital solutions improve operational excellence, reduce cost to serve and support internal and customer’s sales process
 
DIGITAL MARKETING ANALYTICS 
• Define and build a standard measurement and reporting system to evaluate digital 
performance 
• Drive the adoption of data driven approach across marketing community 

ORGANIZATION & CULTURE 
• Drive digital engagement and increase maturity level in the organization by facilitating information exchange, spreading digital knowledge within the organization and driving change management
• Ensure best practices are leveraged, enabling exchange of experiences across the network 
• Lead digital deployment, training and adoption strategy approach 
• Drive Digital Transformation in line with Digital strategy 
• Set up and manage Digital maturity measurement & growth, Digital comms plan
profile_positions.title: Global Digital Marketing Manager

profile_positions.description:
Key responsibilities: 

▪ Contribute to the execution of sales and profitability targets established by the Business Unit by developing the communication plan and supporting allocated countries with the implementation of the market communication plan and marketing materials. 
▪ Develop and executes marketing promotion plans for new product launches 
▪ Conceptualize and executes Marketing campaigns (incl. agency management) 
▪ Manage brand activation including product and brand related advertising, promotions and sponsorships 
▪ Develop digital communication and sales tools for the BU 
▪ Manage brand positioning and brand architecture within guidelines. Consistent look & feel, tone of voice, graphic design, logos e.g.  
▪ In coordination with outside vendors organizes sales promotion events e.g. trade shows, customer gifts, point of sales materials and training programmes. 
▪ Manage BU and country content for lead generation through websites, social media, apps and digital tools. 
▪ Following segment plans, agree and cascade the information on the BU standard for the product-and service related market communication package and sets up, implements and monitors the effectiveness. 
▪ Develop direct Marketing products like mailings, newsletters and brochures. 

Achievements: 

6 product launches, digital sales tools (iPad apps) for different regions & segments, 2 global promotional campaigns for Coil and Packaging Coatings businesses
profile_positions.title: Global Marketing Communications Manager (MarCom, Brand and Digital)

profile_positions.location: DSM Engineering Plastics (Chemelot Campus, Geleen, Netherlands)
profile_positions.description:
Key responsibilities: 
▪ Development and implementation of communication plan focused on Project Management education, in order to influence success rate of PTO projects. 
▪ Development of different communication tools: educational videos, success stories, printed materials,  proposal for PMO internal site and communication / visual language
▪ Coordination and control of external suppliers: video production, design production, illustrators

Achievements:
▪ Videos about the key PM topics: FEL, PMP process, Bluesheeting, Project Meetings, Success stories. 
▪ PMO approach to communication received positive feedback from DEP PM offices worldwide and GM team members, new topics are under development for Marketing community and Corporate communications.
profile_positions.title: Marketing Communications Manager

profile_positions.description:
Key responsibilities:
▪ Development and implementation of communication plan 
▪ Development of multi-channel communication campaigns (TV, Outdoor, Online/Digital, Social Media, Print, Sales tools, PR, Events&Exhibitions, Direct communication); Media buying & planning
▪ Briefing and supervising creative agencies, production companies, photo-shooting, PR- and Event agencies.
▪ Brand management: Strategy, Positioning, Brand Asset Plan, Identity, Value Proposition, Awareness, Involvement
▪ Analytics: Customers, Competitors, Channels, Trends & Insights, ROI (monitoring of campaigns effectiveness).
▪ Development and implementation of Online strategy: Minimization of SAC, maximization of traffic & conversion rate, including development of CPC campaigns, organic search, display ads. 
- Budgeting ($3 million annual advertising budget), reporting Marcom KPI (ARPU, SAC, Churn-rate, Sales), Stakeholder Management

Achievements:
▪ Successful launch of new product which currently presents 52% of company's subscriber base
▪ Development and launch of two national ATL-campaigns (TV, Outdoor, Online) with $3 mln budget. 58% increase in sales of the product as a result of promotional activities
▪ SAC (Subscriber Acquisition Cost) via online channels was reduced by 15%
▪ Corporate re-branding (development and implementation of new brand design and corporate identity)
profile_positions.title: Marketing Communications Manager

profile_positions.description:
International Advertising Agency, part of Interpublic Group  
(#4 advertising network worldwide, $6,7 bln revenue, 7,500 employees, 120 countries)

Key responsibilities:
▪ Development of marketing campaigns for Carlsberg group, Nestle, SEB bank, L'Oreal
▪ Concepts for Online campaigns, Social Media campaigns, localization of global communication materials
▪ Briefing of production companies, supervising of execution (video, photo-shooting, web-design). 

Achievements:
▪ Marketing campaigns for key global clients of McCann with annual budgets ~ $5 mln.
▪ Won 10 awards of international advertising festivals
profile_positions.title: Senior Copywriter (Advertising and Marketing Campaigns, Digital)

profile_positions.description:
International Advertising Agency, part of WPP 
(#1 Advertising Network Worldwide, $15,6 bln revenue, 165,000 employees, 110 countries)

Key responsibilities:
▪ Development of marketing campaigns, communication tools and strategies for Fortune-500 clients 
▪ TV-scripts, ATL-campaigns (Outdoor, Press, Digital), concepts of events, product presentations.
▪ Design: packaging, visual identity, in-store communication
▪ Online Communication (CPC, Banner advertising, Social Media, Online Branding, Direct communication, Sponsorship). 

Achievements:
▪ Launch of mobile operator with $12 million advertising budget
▪ Launch of Shell gas station network in Ukraine (175 stations) and Shell V-Power (#1 Shell fuel brand)
▪ Advertising campaigns for Kraft Foods (Mondelez), Bayer (pharma), Nestle, Unilever
▪ Festival award for Renny (Bayer) press campaign
